tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE city_climate_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(255),
    responsible_department VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    emissions_reduction_goal DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_reduction (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  goal_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  target_emissions DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  emission_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  goal_id INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN,
  progress_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE progress_report (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   year INT,
   emissions_metric DECIMAL,
   target_metric DECIMAL,
   progress_status VARCHAR
);
